page.title: 18MONYASH PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: There are five people on the Parish Council.{Elections are held every {three years.}All members of the Parish over the age of 18 can vote. {The Parish Council meets eleven {times a year}_ usually on the first Tuesday of each month.Members of the public are allowed to attend but not to take part in the meetings. A public meeting is held once a year. {The Parish Council help to look {after the village.}At the moment they are working on getting more street lights in the village.They keep an eye on the condition of the pavements and the grass verges,etc.They try and make sure that any changes in the village are for the better. {The Parish Council is able to {represent the village in dealings with {the District Council and County {Council.
